title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: SaveAs function in the application is not remembering the file type. Additionally, the icon for the file has changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: After using the SaveAs function, the file is saved as a generic file without any specific extension. The file icon has also changed from the java file icon to a generic file icon.
EB: When using the SaveAs function, the file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless otherwise specified. The file icon should remain as the java file icon.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Make modifications to the file (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save icon
4) A dialog box will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Type the filename without including the file extension
7) Click Ok

Observe that the file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but without any file extension shown.
